Package b2bpl.bpl.transformation

Contains classes related to the transformation of a BoogiePL program on an abstract syntax tree level.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BPLTransformator Simple interface to be implemented by every class which would like to contribute to the set of transformations performed on the BoogiePL program resulting from the core translation of bytecode classes to BoogiePL.
 

Class Summary
LoopTransformator Performs a transformation on loops in the procedure implementations of a given BoogiePL program which allows for a sound verification of loops.
 

Package b2bpl.bpl.transformation Description

Contains classes related to the transformation of a BoogiePL program on an abstract syntax tree level.

Every class which would like to contribute to the set of transformations performed on the BoogiePL program resulting from the core translation of bytecode classes to BoogiePL should implement the BPLTransformator interface. Every such transformator registered to the actual translation process is then able to perform an arbitrary set of transformations on the current version of the BoogiePL program being processed.
